data_table.description: Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC2
variable.description: Answered current year [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC3
variable.description: Answered current season [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC4
variable.description: Answered current month [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC5
variable.description: Answered today's date [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC6
variable.description: Answered day of the week [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC7C
variable.description: Answered city of home address [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC7D
variable.description: Answered state of home address [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC7E
variable.description: Answered Zip of home address [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC7F
variable.description: Total number of correct answers for Tic1 through Tic7e [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC8A
variable.description: Participant counted backwards Trial 1 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC8B
variable.description: Participant counted backwards Trial 2 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC9A
variable.description: Listed cabin immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.description: Listed pipe immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.description: Listed watch immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.description: Listed whip immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC9I
variable.description: Listed pillow immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC9J
variable.description: Listed giant immediately after hearing list [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC9K
variable.description: Total number of words listed from Tic9a-Tic9j [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC10A
variable.description: Answered 93 to 100-7 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC10B
variable.description: Answered 86 to 93-7 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC10C
variable.description: Answered 79 to 86-7 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC10D
variable.description: Answered 72 to 79-7 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC10E
variable.description: Answered 65 to 72-7 [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC11
variable.description: Answered scissors when asked how people cut paper [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC12
variable.description: Answered 12 to the number of things in a dozen [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC13
variable.description: Answered cactus to prickly green plant [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC14
variable.description: Answered sheep or lamb to what animal does wool come from [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC15
variable.description: Repeats no ifs, ands or buts [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC16
variable.description: Repeats methodist episcopal [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC17
variable.description: Answers current president [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC18
variable.description: Answers current vice president [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC19
variable.description: Follows instruction to tap finger 5 times on mouthpiece of phone [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC20
variable.description: Answered east as opposite of west [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.name: TIC21
variable.description: Answered antonym of generous [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]

variable.description: Recalled cabin from earlier list of words [Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status]
